<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List all access policies</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/iam/v1/access_policies"}></MethodEndpoint>



List all access policies. If `role` or `principal` is specified,
this returns all access policies using the specified role or 
or that is assigned to the identified principal.


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The [role](/sase/docs/all-roles) that you want to use for this list operation.\n","in":"query","name":"role","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The email address of the principal that you want to use for this list operation.\n","in":"query","name":"principal","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful response.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"count"} required={true} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"default":1,"description":"Total count of the items","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>items</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span><span className={"openapi-schema__divider"}></span><span className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Access policy unique identifier.\n","example":"9d5104a0-1b0e-4f1d-be40-87f7810327e9","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"inherited_from"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The lowest level TSG to which the access policy belongs.\n","example":"1234567890","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"principal"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The email address of the user or service account that is granted this\naccess policy.\n","example":"user@paloaltonetworks.com","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"principal_display_name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"_firstname lastname_ OR _firstname_ OR _username_.\n","example":"firstname lastname","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"principal_type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Whether the principal is a user or a service account.\n","example":"user","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"resource"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The resource to which this access policy is assigned. It is in the format:\n\n  `prn:<TSG_ID>::::`\n","example":"prn:123::::","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"role"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The [role](/sase/docs/all-roles) used for this access policy.\n","example":"superuser","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"count\": 1,\n  \"items\": [\n    {\n      \"id\": \"9d5104a0-1b0e-4f1d-be40-87f7810327e9\",\n      \"inherited_from\": \"1234567890\",\n      \"principal\": \"user@paloaltonetworks.com\",\n      \"principal_display_name\": \"firstname lastname\",\n      \"principal_type\": \"user\",\n      \"resource\": \"prn:123::::\",\n      \"role\": \"superuser\"\n    }\n  ]\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
